Text: Can anyone confirm this torrent legit or waste of bandwidth?
charlesfire22's torrents are always good. Small size and very good quality. I am a big fan. Thanks charlesfire22 for great work. Excellent
how about some file information asshat

I think that the size (pixels) is a bit small for normal DVD quality, because the vertical pixels are only like around 272 I think.. But I found out that I think all of the ones with SPARKS in the name is the same size, because I downloaded it from extremezone also and it was the same size as this one..

One good thing about charlesfire22's though is that it is one file.. Where as extremezone's and scene4all's are split in to 2 files, as if any one still uses CDs any more in this day and age..

Thank you for sharing this. A great download. 
V 10, A 9.
